message: Just wanted to start some conversation. What device do you own, and have you jailbroken to 4.3.1?
I updated my iPhone 4 and jailbroke yesterday, mostly everything works except AppBackup isn't supported yet (which I didn't know) so I temporarily lost some data
iPhone 4 still in 4.2.1 I usually wait a bit to make sure that I won't lose the ability to unlock.
You'll have to upgrade without upgrading the baseband: http://www.iclarified.com/entry/index.php?enid=13795
But I don't even know if it's worth the hassle, the last couple iOS updates haven't brought anything worthwhile anyway
